snippet: Bryan Fox and Austin Smith recently found themselves on the front lines against energy drinks when they wrote “Drink Water” on the decks of their snowboards.
abstract: Professional snowboarders Bryan Fox and Austin Smith found themselves on the front lines against energy drinks when they wrote 'Drink Water' on the decks of their snowboards.
lead_paragraph: Bryan Fox and Austin Smith recently found themselves on the front lines against energy drinks when they wrote “Drink Water” on the decks of their snowboards.

headline.seo: Pro-Water in Snowboarding Culture Heavy on Energy Drinks
headline.main: Wary of Energy Drinks in an Adrenaline Sport
headline.print_headline: Wary of Energy Drinks in Adrenaline Sport
